We are committed to doing all we can to ensure Kiwis are protected from family violence.
https://t.co/66QMCuzKpj https://t.co/CUY8TvZByW

775491830460747776.text: “None of us should be deterred by the difficulty of the problem. Rather we should be motivated by the positive difference we can make.”

775491033647882240.text: “You deserve and are entitled to a life free from fear, and your children deserve and are entitled to that too. Help is available.”

775490635839045632.text: “Our new approach will revolve around intervening sooner, and more effectively.”

775490163484930048.text: “Today I am announcing an overhaul of the family violence prevention system.”

775489731865944064.text: “It’s easy to think this is someone else’s problem. But it is not someone else’s problem if you are a New Zealander who cares.”

775489261906698240.text: “Today I want to focus on how we intend to address the harm in our society caused by repeated family violence.”

775488832921702400.text: “This Government has not shied away from hard problems, particularly where we think our intervention can make a positive difference.”

775488337494757376.text: "We know that addressing social problems often means confronting issues that are distressing to deal with."

649695026876780544.text: "I leave proud of the contribution New Zealand is making on the Security Council." #UNGA

649694898975698944.text: "As I prepare to leave New York, I do so proud of the contribution that New Zealand has made to the sustainable development of our oceans."

649694685225594880.text: "New Zealand is committed to managing our oceans responsibly and we are working with our Pacific neighbours to do the same." #UNGA

649694587389284352.text: "The Kermadec Ocean Sanctuary will comprise 620,000 km2 of ocean in one of the most pristine and special environments on Earth." #UNGA

649694466203226113.text: "I was pleased to announce earlier this week the creation a marine sanctuary around New Zealand’s Kermadec Islands." #UNGA

649694371240022016.text: "Healthy and productive oceans are a key requirement for a sustainable future." #UNGA

649694101521039360.text: "We want to contribute to a Council that is genuinely focused on finding practical solutions to political problems." #UNGA

649693587936927744.text: "We believe small states have a positive contribution to make and we want to provide a voice for those who go unheard too often." #UNGA

649693002403721216.text: "It’s time for the Council to stop talking about what’s right and do what’s right." #UNGA

649692364433297409.text: "We are doing what we can to help the victims of the Syrian conflict and to combat the scourge of ISIL." #UNGA

649692031174836224.text: "The Iran deal was a notable bright spot this year. New Zealand is proud that this occurred during our Presidency in July." #UNGA

591923021587292160.text: "The soldiers who fought here, on both sides, served their countries with great courage and honour." #ANZAC100

591922708926992384.text: "Like the New Zealanders, they were brave & were mourned by their grieving families & friends. Today, I want to acknowledge them." #ANZAC100

591922455305793537.text: “On a hill by the sea in Wellington there is a monument that remembers the man & the soldiers that died defending their homeland” #ANZAC100

591922173532475392.text: "The hilltop was soon recaptured by Ottoman Turkish troops. Their commander was Mustafa Kemal who later became a great leader." #ANZAC100

591921925988847616.text: "Shortly after 3am the New Zealanders, together with some British soldiers, reached the summit where we are now standing." #ANZAC100

591920934254030848.text: “It was not the scene of great triumph. But it was the closest the Allied forces came to making a breakthrough in the campaign" #ANZAC100

591920881946865667.text: "For New Zealanders, nowhere in Gallipoli is more special than here on Chunuk Bair." #ANZAC100

591907779016699905.text: Moving Australian and Turkish services - Lone Pine and 57th Regiment. http://t.co/jD7NLb8ZrF

591876242523099136.text: Met with Prince Charles and Prince Harry after the dawn service and spent time with Aussie World War One widows. http://t.co/nNMUApgwJD

591801089881571328.text: You can read my full speech to the Anzac Cove commemorations here: http://t.co/Xe2svVipdE #Anzac100

591795701870297088.text: "After one hundred years we can say, on this day April 25, 2015, 'We remember'." #Anzac100 http://t.co/592rC7JLf0

591795370415378432.text: "The generosity of Turkey in welcoming us back here... means that Gallipoli also symbolises the healing power of time." #Anzac100

591795251703992320.text: "While this was a place of courage and heroism and duty, it was also a place of fear and waste and loss." #Anzac100

591795159529984000.text: "Gallipoli is also a byword for the best characteristics of Australians and New Zealanders." #Anzac100

591795083571134464.text: "... It means the names and stories of more than 2,700 New Zealanders who died here." #Anzac100

591795041858785280.text: "Gallipoli to us Kiwis means not only this sea, this beach, these cliffs and the narrows across the hills..." #Anzac100

591794274926141440.text: “On this beach, on this day, at this hour, exactly 100 years ago, the first Anzac troops came ashore.” #Anzac100

590002749086896129.text: I was honoured to host @TonyAbbottMHR today for the opening of ANZAC Square at Pukeahu National War Memorial Park. http://t.co/9rraZO6L8h

589914258076401664.text: "Now we welcome the Australian memorial having pride of place in our own national commemorative precinct, Anzac Square."

589913979331313664.text: "Our New Zealand Memorial standing proudly at the head of Anzac Parade in Canberra is of great significance to New Zealanders."

589913677265940480.text: "For New Zealanders and Australians in particular, it is also the symbolic beginning of what we now think of as the Anzac spirit."

589913214453841921.text: "The name Gallipoli has become synonymous with acts of great courage, immense hardship & terrible sacrifice on both sides of the campaign."

589272299016093697.text: I urge all New Zealanders to visit Pukeahu to pause and remember those who serve our country in times of war & peace. http://t.co/ARxg8AozRD

589210950839848960.text: You can read the full text of my speech for the opening of Pukeahu National War Memorial Park here: http://t.co/a92Uy3Ykts

589210397023948800.text: "Pukeahu National War Memorial Park will help us honour the pledge that we regularly renew: Lest We Forget."

589209859020619776.text: "We have created a place imbued with deep significance, which will be meaningful to New Zealanders for many generations to come."

589209306030964736.text: "They can come here also to honour the hundreds of thousands of New Zealand men and women who have served their country."

589208741079224320.text: "With the opening of Pukeahu National War Memorial Park, we add another dimension and a place for New Zealanders to come together."

563419223225925632.text: RT @NZNationalParty: You can read the full text of @johnkeypm's #WaitangiDay speech here: http://t.co/Dll1ZJ61tL http://t.co/lMTYqhyBgY

563413258975985665.text: “I am confident the next 25 years will deliver more promises, passion and achievements as we work together.” #WaitangiDay

563412788987441152.text: “On #WaitangiDay we remember when our nation-building began, and we celebrate the hope and optimism our forebears must have felt.”

563412275369766912.text: “If we choose a new flag, it will serve us in times of celebration and remembrance, like #WaitangiDay.”

563411879976914944.text: “This milestone year in our history is a good time to discuss the flag, formally and respectfully.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/4mrkG9Uhi1

563411246725079041.text: “I believe many New Zealanders feel the same, that the flag captures a colonial and post-colonial era whose time has passed.” #WaitangiDay

563410799540973568.text: “In 2040, I’d like to see a new New Zealand flag raised at the #WaitangiDay dawn service.”

563410257829851137.text: “I’m a firm believer in the current process, which is addressing the wrongs done in the past to help Māori build their futures” #WaitangiDay

563409768849498112.text: “Settled iwi are creating success stories. They see the post-settlement environment as their chance to shape their own destiny” #WaitangiDay

563409281869807618.text: “The Crown has now signed 72 deeds of settlement – 46 of those in the past six years.” #WaitangiDay

563408785205493760.text: “I am confident that when we celebrate the bicentenary of the Treaty signing in 2040, we will look back to today & be proud.” #WaitangiDay

563408219825917955.text: “He iwi tahi tātou – we are one people.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/61NHvR66RD

563407739196411905.text: “The generosity of Māori, & the good faith of both people, has led to the NZ we know today, and to the relationship we share.” #WaitangiDay

563407520065015809.text: “Māori and Pākehā alike, have developed a Treaty partnership which is admired around the world.” #WaitangiDay http://t.co/vl07yv9g2D

563407250396434432.text: “Today we commemorate 175 years of the Treaty of Waitangi relationship. It’s a relationship we should all have pride in.” #WaitangiDay

563387467282141184.text: Beautiful morning for the #WaitangiDay dawn service. http://t.co/5wnVSPW6y8

483492637773529088.text: Highlights from the @nznationalparty conference at the weekend. #TeamKey in great spirits going into this campaign. http://t.co/0OJty52udH

483057327163994112.text: Great to speak at @nznationalparty conference on how #TeamKey are working for New Zealand. https://t.co/GyJiPmEL0o http://t.co/cQlTsXcfZq

483036874714275840.text: "Together, let’s keep working for New Zealand!" #TeamKey

483036509344235520.text: "Our country is firmly on the right track. Our party is in good heart. Our government is delivering strong & stable leadership." #TeamKey

483036370152091649.text: "Taken together, these roading projects represent a significant new commitment in our regions." #TeamKey

483035414601539585.text: "That’s why today I am pleased to announce a package of 14 regional roading projects across the country." #TeamKey

483034853323980800.text: "On good roads you get better public transport, more efficient freight movement, faster journeys & safer trips for NZ families." #TeamKey

483034685233057792.text: "Over the last six years, our Government has invested heavily in vital infrastructure to make up for years of underinvestment." #TeamKey

483034497080762368.text: "This election is going to be much, much tighter than many people realise. We’re going to have to work hard for every vote." #TeamKey

483034327450521600.text: "The future is positive for New Zealand. National is the party for people who care about that future." #TeamKey

483033968678154241.text: "We made a commitment to the people of Canterbury on day one and we will not waver from it." #TeamKey

483033929281052672.text: "Our policies will build on the strong foundations we’ve laid over the last six years." #TeamKey

483033929243312128.text: "We’ll continue to focus attention on what matters. And we’ll continue to support Christchurch through the rebuild." #TeamKey

483033085286420480.text: "Work offers the sort of independence, opportunity and self-esteem that a life on welfare never can." #TeamKey

483032805949984769.text: "It’s under a National-led government that around 1,500 people a week are coming off welfare and into work." #TeamKey

483032683367235585.text: "I’m in politics because I care about other New Zealanders, particularly those families who need a hand to pick themselves up." #TeamKey

483032582871724032.text: "I’m proud to say that we’re the party that’s bringing in free doctors’ visits and prescriptions for children under 13." #TeamKey

483032510729707520.text: "We’re increasing paid parental leave, we’re boosting support for families with new-born children." #TeamKey

483032426986229760.text: "The Government is ensuring that families share the dividends of that growth." #TeamKey

483032345289580544.text: "We have a plan, and that plan is working for New Zealand. Over the last year an extra 84,000 jobs were created." #TeamKey

483032216444760064.text: "People are confident they can make a difference in their own lives, & that their children and grandchildren have good prospects." #TeamKey

483032096022097920.text: "A strong economy isn’t an end in itself. It’s a way of delivering the things people care most about." #TeamKey

483031842006630400.text: "And next year, after all we’ve been through as a country, I’m proud to say that the Government’s books will be back in the black." #TeamKey

483031736138207232.text: "Getting it back on track has been tough. But this month we recorded the third-highest growth rate in the developed world." #TeamKey

483031660552667136.text: "Your efforts are crucial in this election. And I know that what motivates me also motivates you." #TeamKey

483031577362845696.text: "I want to thank all the National Party volunteers who’ll be busy in the coming weeks." #TeamKey

483031493006991360.text: "I want to thank my wife Bronagh for her support and encouragement – I couldn’t do it without you." #TeamKey

483031321279598592.text: "Together, we are providing stable government that’s making a real difference for New Zealanders." #TeamKey

483031066379165696.text: "Doesn’t it feel good to be a member of the National Party?" #TeamKey
